title: Himi 295
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
’Eiki ‘o hēvani,
Pea mo māmani,
Ke ke ‘Afio mai,
Kia kimautolu;
Kuo mau fakataha mai
Ke hū ki ho’o ‘Afio.
2.
Ko e anga kovi
Pea loto vaivai;
‘Eiki, tokoni mai
Ke mau fa’a kumi
Ki he ‘Afiona,’Eiki,
‘I he huafa ‘o Sīsū.
3.
Pea ke mau ma’u
‘A e loto fo’ou;
Pea tonuhia,
‘I he’emau tui;
Pea fai talangofua
‘I he ‘aho kotoa pē. *
